title: A Sassy Wedding
description: Sassy Mates Series 3.7An Alpha and his BBW finally get their walk down the aisle...Attention, this is NOT a standalone nor is it a FULL length book. This is a SHORT, meant to be read once Books 1-3 have been read. This short follows the story line from previous books.Time to revisit Jordan and Aric.With everyone in Vegas for a girl's week, Jordan's stress level goes through the roof with wedding plans, until Aric decides to take matters into his own hands.Read about what he does to help Jordan with the wedding. And then, see what happens when Jordan comes face to face with her past. If you don't like sex of any kind, this is probably not the book for you. Intended for 18+ readers only.
author: Milly Taiden
